incidents.name: [LIM][Dedicated Servers] - Rack L115B17 incident notification
incidents.message: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the rack L115B17 in LIM. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 13/04/2025 06:15 UTC Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the rack L115B17 are currently unavailable. Customers Impact : Customers are currently unable to access and use their servers located in the specified rack. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
